subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Big Mistake!
author: paranormalearl
full_text:
You think she will figure out how to use it?
I mean i don't know off hand what #63 looks like or how many knobs it 
has for tuning and pules speed but you have to have it set right to hear 
stuff right.
Earl..

Frank Sumption wrote:
>  
> http://www.bad-language.com/ <http://www.bad-language.com/>
>  
>  I was lead to believe this person had an interset in the box, and she 
> brought her "boyfirend" that just happen to be local, to our meeting
